item.description:
Presentations by Igor Kharitonenkov of Bootstrap Compost, Bruce Fulford of City Soil and Greenhouse LLC. and the Operator of the City of Boston Yard Waste Compost Site and AnnMcGovern, Compost Specialist, Mass. DEP Bureau of Waste Prevention

RSVP Required by contacting karen@bostonnatural.org
item.how_to_find_us: Take the red or orange line to Downtown Crossing and walk southeast to 62 Summer Street and take a left onto Otis Street. You can also take the green line to Park Street or the Blue Line to State Street. Our main entrance is on Otis Street
item.name: Boston Composts! Community Garden and Residential Compost Resources in Boston
